mapper.select: select count(id) cnt from student where id like '%${findStr}%' or mName like '%${findStr}%' or email like '%${findStr}%' or phone like '%${findStr}%'
select * from student where id like '%${findStr}%' or mName like '%${findStr}%' or email like '%${findStr}%' or phone like '%${findStr}%' limit ${startNo-1} , ${listSize}
select id from student where phone = #{phone} and email=#{email}
select pwd from student where id=#{id} and email=#{email}
select * from student where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into student(id, mName, gender, pwd, phone, zipcode, address, email) values(#{id}, #{mName}, #{gender}, #{pwd}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{email})
mapper.delete: delete from student where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
